name: Dodge The Blocks! (Cataclysmic)
description: Play DTB!, a fun block dodging game with a twist...Abilities! Use Abilities to help you dodge the blocks more and gain a higher score! (Future updates will include more Abilities and even different game modes!) I'll try to update once or twice a week, and will be trying to give you the best content(bug-free of course)! Enjoy this game that was made in around 7 hours for free:)!
